answerText: Akt[10] Insulin is released from the islet cells of this organ, which contains both endocrine and exocrine sections.
heading: Penn Bowl |2014 | 3 | 10 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Like PI3-kinase, this class of kinases is inhibited by Perifosine. For 10 points each: [10] Name this family of serine-threonine protein kinases, also known as protein kinase B. Its second member, which is cytosolic, is found in the insulin signalling pathway, where it indirectly activates mTOR
